name: NSFindPanelAction
desc: These constants define the tags for performFindPanelAction(_:).

items.name: case next
items.desc: Finds the next instance of the queried text.

items.name: case previous
items.desc: Finds the previous instance of the queried text.

items.name: case replaceAll
items.desc: Replaces all query instances within the text view.

items.name: case replace
items.desc: Replaces a single query instance within the text view.

items.name: case replaceAndFind
items.desc: Replaces a single query instance and finds the next.

items.name: case setFindString
items.desc: Sets the query string to the current selection.

items.name: case replaceAllInSelection
items.desc: Replaces all query instances within the selection.

items.name: case selectAll
items.desc: Selects all query instances in the text view.

items.name: case selectAllInSelection
items.desc: Selects all query instances within the selection.
